mapper.select: select * from ( select t.*, rownum rnum from ( select id, thumbnail from product where id in ( select product_id from product_order where status = 5 group by product_id having sum(product_amount) >= 50) order by id desc) t) where rnum <= 5

select * from ( select t.*, rownum rnum from ( select id, name, discount, price, thumbnail from product where to_char(create_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_char(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') order by create_date desc) t) where rnum <= 6

select * from ( select rownum rnum, t1.* from ( select id, name, discount, price, thumbnail from product order by id desc) t1)
